name: The Pond is Bigger Than He Look
name_original: The Pond is Bigger Than He Look
description:
Dart across the water, eating bugs to gain energy and jump back to your home. "the Pond is Bigger than He Look" is a physics-based Ludum Dare 45 game about being a pondskater bug, created by Jake White and Benjamin Busche in 72 hours.

Controls:

Mouse - Rotate
Left click - Dart forward
Space - Jump, hold to increase trajectory
Tab - Open/Close scorecard
